languages.text: "Он, конечно, мерзким отродьем был, но согласись, дед, он смог обмануть простолюдинов сказочками о свободе. Может, как-то полегче с ними можно обходиться, а?"
"Look, I know he was a mutant freak. But you have to admit, old man: he did trick people with promises of freedom. Maybe we should ease up on them a little, you know?"
languages.original_text: "Он, конечно, мерзким отродьем был, но согласись, дед, он смог обмануть простолюдинов сказочками о свободе. Может, как-то полегче с ними можно обходиться, а?"

traits.locale_text: "Look, I know he was a mutant freak, but you have to admit it, old man: the serfs had their reasons to adore him. Maybe we should ease up on them a little, you know?"
"Look, I know he was a mutant freak, but you have to admit it, old man: the serfs had their reasons to adore him. Maybe we should ease up on them a little, you know?"
"Look, I know he was a mutant freak. But you have to admit, old man: the serfs had their reasons to adore him. Maybe we should ease up on them a little, you know?"

"Look, I know he was a mutant freak. But you have to admit, old man: he did trick people with promises of freedom. Maybe we should ease up on them a little, you know?"
"Look, I know he was a mutant freak. But you have to admit, old man: he did trick the people with promises of freedom. Maybe we should ease up on them a little, you know?"

languages.text: "Ich weiß, er war ein mutierter Freak. Aber Ihr müsst zugeben, alter Mann, er hat Leute getäuscht, indem er ihnen Freiheit versprach. Vielleicht sollten wir etwas nachsichtiger mit ihnen sein?"
languages.original_text: "Look, I know he was a mutant freak. But you have to admit, old man: he did trick people with promises of freedom. Maybe we should ease up on them a little, you know?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, er war ein mutierter Freak. Aber Ihr müsst zugeben, alter Mann, er hat Leute getäuscht, indem er ihnen Freiheit versprach. Vielleicht sollten wir etwas nachsichtiger mit ihnen sein?"

"Ich weiß, dass er ein Mutant war gut? Ein Freak. Aber Ihr müsst zugeben, alter Mann: Die Sklaven hatten ihre Gründe, warum sie ihn verehrt haben. Vielleicht sollten wir nicht zu streng mit ihnen sein, wisst Ihr?"

languages.text: « Écoutez, mon vieux, je sais bien que c'était une saleté de mutant, mais il faut reconnaître qu'il a dupé les serfs avec des promesses de liberté. Peut-être qu'on devrait les ménager un peu, vous ne croyez pas ? »
languages.original_text: "Look, I know he was a mutant freak. But you have to admit, old man: he did trick people with promises of freedom. Maybe we should ease up on them a little, you know?"

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez, mon vieux, je sais bien que c'était une saleté de mutant, mais il faut reconnaître qu'il a dupé les serfs avec des promesses de liberté. Peut-être qu'on devrait les ménager un peu, vous ne croyez pas ? »

« Écoutez, mon vieux, je sais bien que c'était une saleté de mutant, mais il faut reconnaître que les serfs avaient des raisons de l'aduler. Peut-être qu'on devrait les ménager un peu, vous ne croyez pas ? »

languages.text: «Mire, anciano, ya sé que era un espantajo mutante, pero tiene que admitirlo: engañó a la gente prometiéndoles la libertad. Igual deberíamos tratarlos un poco mejor, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "Look, I know he was a mutant freak. But you have to admit, old man: he did trick people with promises of freedom. Maybe we should ease up on them a little, you know?"

traits.locale_text: «Mire, anciano, ya sé que era un espantajo mutante, pero tiene que admitirlo: engañó a la gente prometiéndoles la libertad. Igual deberíamos tratarlos un poco mejor, ¿no?».
«Mire, anciano, ya sé que era un espantajo mutante, pero tiene que admitirlo: engañó a la gente prometiéndoles la libertad. Igual deberíamos tratarlos un poco mejor, ¿no?».

languages.text: 「あのね、あいつが変異体の変人だったことは知っているんだから。けどね、おじちゃん、あいつは自由を約束してみんなを騙したんだって認めた方がいいよ。あたいらもちょっとは大目に見てあげてもいいんじゃないの？」
languages.original_text: "Look, I know he was a mutant freak. But you have to admit, old man: he did trick people with promises of freedom. Maybe we should ease up on them a little, you know?"

traits.locale_text: 「あのね、あいつが変異体の変人だったことは知っているんだから。けどね、おじちゃん、あいつは自由を約束してみんなを騙したんだって認めた方がいいよ。あたいらもちょっとは大目に見てあげてもいいんじゃないの？」
「彼が変異体の化け物だということは分かっていた。でも、あなたは認めるべきよ、おじいさん。農奴たちには彼を慕う理由があった。少しは手加減したほうがいいんじゃない？」

languages.text: “听着，我知道他是个变种人，但你得承认，老家伙，他所谓的什么‘自由’，确实把大家都忽悠住了。说真的，或许我们应该对底层船员仁慈一点，你说呢？”
languages.original_text: "Look, I know he was a mutant freak. But you have to admit, old man: he did trick people with promises of freedom. Maybe we should ease up on them a little, you know?"

traits.locale_text: “听着，我知道他是个变种人，但你得承认，老家伙，他所谓的什么‘自由’，确实把大家都忽悠住了。说真的，或许我们应该对底层船员仁慈一点，你说呢？”
“听着，我知道他是个变种人，但你得承认，老家伙，那些船员确实有理由崇拜他。说真的，或许我们应该对底层船员仁慈一点，你说呢？”

languages.original_text: "Look, I know he was a mutant freak. But you have to admit, old man: he did trick the people with promises of freedom. Maybe we should ease up on them a little, you know?"
